faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.faq1Q: Is the first estimate really free?
faq.faq1A: Yes, absolutely free. No registration, no card, no hidden conditions. Just paste your spec and get the result.
faq.faq2Q: Can I edit the finished estimate?
faq.faq2A: Of course! After receiving the result, you can edit any parameters: stages, hours, cost. It's your document.
faq.faq3A: We analyze your specification and based on experience from thousands of projects, determine work stages, time for each stage, and market cost.
faq.faq4Q: Can I download the estimate as PDF?
faq.faq4A: Yes, after registration you get access to download the estimate in PDF format without watermarks.
faq.faq5Q: What types of projects are supported?
faq.faq5A: We support web development, mobile apps, APIs, integrations, and most typical freelance development tasks.
faq.faq6Q: How to use the estimate in client negotiations?
faq.faq6A: The estimate serves as a basis for discussing scope of work. You can adjust rates and stages for specific clients.

pricing.pricingSubtitle: Pay only for the number of estimates. No subscriptions, no hidden conditions. First estimate always free.
